parameters.name: InstanceArea
parameters.description:
The type of the instance on which the database is deployed. Valid values:

*   **RDS**: an Alibaba Cloud database instance.
*   **ECS**: an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance on which a self-managed database is deployed.
*   **IDC**: a self-managed database instance that is not deployed on Alibaba Cloud.

>  IDC refers to your data center.

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description: The endpoint that is used to access the instance over internal networks.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description: The network type of the instance.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port that is used to access the instance over internal networks.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username that is used to log on to the database.
